snippet: A lackluster stock market last year cooled the market for I.P.O.'s, but after stocks surged in the first quarter this year, many companies have filed or reinstated plans to go public.
abstract: A lackluster stock market last year cooled the market for I.P.O.'s, but after stocks surged in the first quarter this year, many companies have filed or reinstated plans to go public.

headline.main: I.P.O. Market Rebounds as Companies Resume Plans
